docs.title: Welcome to the Sandbox
docs.text: This is where we experiment with MkDocs features, configurations, and more.

docs.title: Setup
docs.text: Instructions on how to install and configure this MkDocs project.

docs.title: Installation
docs.text:
1. Install Python 3.
  2. pip install mkdocs-material
  3. mkdocs serve to start your local dev server.

docs.title: Configuration
docs.text: Details on configuring mkdocs.yml, including theme, plugins, etc.

docs.title: Reference
docs.text: This section provides reference material, code snippets, or documentation for features tested in this Sandbox project.

docs.title: Examples
docs.text:
• Snippets for advanced markdown usage.
  • Documentation for custom CSS or JS overrides.

...
